--- create_model_with_trailing_commas.sql
CREATE MODEL MyModel INPUT(
  prompt STRING(MAX),
 ) OUTPUT(
  content STRING(MAX),
 ) REMOTE OPTIONS (
  endpoint = '//aiplatform.googleapis.com/projects/PROJECT/locations/LOCATION/endpoints/ENDPOINT_ID',
  default_batch_size = 1
)
--- AST
&ast.CreateModel{
  Remote: 87,
  Name:   &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 13,
    NameEnd: 20,
    Name:    "MyModel",
  },
  InputOutput: &ast.CreateModelInputOutput{
    Input:        21,
    Rparen:       85,
    InputColumns: []*ast.CreateModelColumn{
      &ast.CreateModelColumn{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 30,
          NameEnd: 36,
          Name:    "prompt",
        },
        DataType: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
          NamePos: 37,
          Rparen:  47,
          Name:    "STRING",
          Max:     true,
        },
      },
    },
    OutputColumns: []*ast.CreateModelColumn{
      &ast.CreateModelColumn{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 63,
          NameEnd: 70,
          Name:    "content",
        },
        DataType: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
          NamePos: 71,
          Rparen:  81,
          Name:    "STRING",
          Max:     true,
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 94,
    Rparen:  231,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 106,
          NameEnd: 114,
          Name:    "endpoint",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 117,
          ValueEnd: 204,
          Value:    "//aiplatform.googleapis.com/projects/PROJECT/locations/LOCATION/endpoints/ENDPOINT_ID",
        },
      },
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 208,
          NameEnd: 226,
          Name:    "default_batch_size",
        },
        Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 229,
          ValueEnd: 230,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE MODEL MyModel INPUT (prompt STRING(MAX)) OUTPUT (content STRING(MAX)) REMOTE OPTIONS (endpoint = "//aiplatform.googleapis.com/projects/PROJECT/locations/LOCATION/endpoints/ENDPOINT_ID", default_batch_size = 1)
